title: The Mac Mini Killer just got BETTER! - Minisforum @ Computex 2023
description: Get hooked up with the latest and greatest audio gear at   Minisforum has been making some awesome tiny PCs and their new UM790 looks like it could be another hit. Jake stopped by their booth to put the PC through the gauntlet to see if it's worth your time and money.   Check out the Minisforum UM790 Pro:  Buy a Minisforum Venus UM773 Lite Mini PC:  Check out ASUS Monitors on Amazon:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 How do they do it? 0:36 UM790 Pro ports and design impressions 2:25 Teardown 4:06 Sponsor - Sweetwater 4:34 Specs and more tearing down 5:40 Boot up and performance expectations 6:46 Benchmarking 9:22 Overall thoughts 9:49 Outro
